alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 17 at 3:51PM EDT until May 17 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR CENTRAL THOMAS COUNTY... At 351 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Even though heavy rainfall has diminished across the warned area, widespread flooding continues across the city of Thomasville. Local law enforcement reports numerous roads flooded. Between 3 and 4 inches of rain have fallen in the last 2 Hours. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Thomasville, Newark and Eason. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Do not drive around barricades and heed any road closures.
